statements: DELETE FROM customer_engagement_reports WHERE retention_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM customer_engagement_reports WHERE customer_id = 123 AND retention_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM customer_engagement_reports WHERE acquisition_date < '2022-01-01' AND engagement_score < 0.5;
DELETE FROM customer_engagement_reports WHERE engagement_score BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7;
DELETE FROM customer_acquisition WHERE customer_id = 100 AND acquisition_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customer_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'Email' AND interaction_count < 5;
DELETE FROM customer_acquisition WHERE acquisition_channel = 'Social Media' OR first_purchase_amount < 100.00;
DELETE FROM CustomerAcquisition WHERE acquisition_channel = 'Organic' AND acquisition_date < '2022-06-01';
DELETE FROM EngagementMetrics WHERE page_views < 100 AND interactions < 10;
DELETE FROM engagement_metrics WHERE page_views < 100 AND interactions < 10;
